attributes.background: For example for history u have to get more than half marks to get a 5 and a friend of mines daughter for 60% and got a 4 on her mock and her other daughter got 40% and got a 3

rejection.details:
Grade boundaries aren't decided by the Government or Parliament. They are set by exam boards.

You can find out more here:

https://www.gov.uk/government/publications/gcse-and-a-level-exams-how-marking-and-grading-works
